comment: Math isnt my subject( C's all thru high school &  in Math 1101)but got an A. Awesome prof. She spends the whole class time making sure you understand. Posts notes, offers extra credit, makes study guides, and gave us 2 take home tests. Homework on Connectmath so try til you get it right. Stopped going mid-semester and taught myself the material.

I am more of a calculus person than a statistics person, so I was quite nervous walking into this class. However, Professor McCanns makes it very easy to learn. She's also very kind and will answer every single person's question even if it consumes twenty minutes of class time. Make sure to stay on top of everything and you'll do fine.
She is very helpful friendly and nice. Pay attention and stay on top of everything.
